The trip forward is easy enough. The lava is no longer following after Rat
=
Trap and Nightshift, but instead is just lapping up against stone and earth=

like some weird seashore, where the water was molten rock, the shoreline
m=
elted stone and the air is filled with the stench of sulfur and smoke that
=
rose into the skies.

Ahead of the duo the burnt out trees beckoned, hot wi=
nds whipped through
them, causing the trees to bend and creak. A few downed=
 trees occasionally
lay in Nightshift=92s path, but other than that the gro=
und before them was
open and relatively flat.

The Unicronian signal was st=
eadily getting closer as they drove forward,
they were obviously going in t=
he right direction to reach it. However as
they were moving they were picki=
ng up also another energy signature =96 one of
the insect horde.

The trees=
 themselves were finally begining to fill in, leaves were starting
to appea=
r as they travveled. Evidently they were now comming into areas that
had no=
t been touched by the blast of lava and het from the steadilly more
distant=
 volcano.

However as they moved something was happeneing, they could see w=
here trees
had fallen, where others had been scorched and burnt, others kno=
cked over,
cracked and pulverized. From the energy reading that were being =
examined, it
would seem that there was a battle of sorts taking place, and =
they were
driving right toward it!

(TAG)

Preston

--001636d34fc2b588f704a261c32f
